MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL72 postcode area of Moelfre. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30PM due to a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05PM on 8th April 2021
